column4: Maybe I just missed it, but did Ubuntu not ask about what I wanted to install and rather just installed... everything... by default? I expected a "normal" or "custom" option somewhere in the installer.
it just does a default install.  no options.. you can add or subtract from thee.
because ubuntu tried to give the best options for people that know nothing about computers and just want the functionality right out of the box..
asked and answered.. usefull to other.. just uninstall them.
